title: Song & dance = Song and dance
creator_credit: Really Useful Films, Cameron Mackintosh and Tom Gutteridge
brief_description: This presentation of Andrew Lloyd Webber’s Song and Dance was recorded live for television at the Palace Theatre, London. It is a musical in two acts with the first act “Song - Tell me on a Sunday” featuring the beautiful voice of Sarah Brightman in the role of Emma, and the second act “Dance - Variations” starring dancer Wayne Sleep in the role of Joe. Lyrics by Don Black, choreography by Anthony Van Laast and musical direction by David Caddick.
